MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY4 postcode area of Shrewsbury, affecting properties in Petton Lane and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.30AM due to necessary repairs to the electrical cable network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 11.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.52AM on 18th April 2021.
